questions.question: What does a yellow traffic light indicate?
When approaching a school zone, what should you do?
options: Slow down and watch for children
Ignore it, as it doesn't affect your driving

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle starts skidding on a wet road?
options: Steer in the direction you want to go

questions.question: What is the legal blood alcohol concentration (BAC) limit for drivers in most states?
When parking uphill with a curb, which way should your wheels be turned?
What does a solid white line between lanes of traffic indicate?
When can you proceed through an intersection after a red light turns green?
What is the purpose of an acceleration lane on a highway entrance ramp?
options: To speed up and merge with highway traffic

questions.question: What does a solid yellow line on your side of the road indicate?
options: You can pass if it's safe
Passing is allowed only during daylight hours
Passing is allowed for large vehicles

questions.question: If you are involved in a minor crash with no injuries, what should you do?
options: Exchange information with the other driver(s)
Call the police only if it's your fault
